plugins.name: Ghost Frames
plugins.description:
Transform your text layers into beautiful ghost frames with a single click! Perfect for creating redacted versions of your UI designs, placeholder mockups, or anonymised portfolio pieces.


üéØ Key Features:

  1. Converts any text layer into a rounded rectangle frame
  2. Preserves text colours and styling
  3. Maintains original text dimensions and positioning
  4. Smart opacity based on text size and length
  5. Works with nested components and instances
  6. Handles mixed text styles within layers


‚ú® Use Cases:

  1. Create clean, minimalist versions of UI designs
  2. Make placeholder/redacted versions for client presentations
  3. Generate anonymised screenshots for portfolios
  4. Prototype loading states and skeleton screens
  5. Create beautiful marketing materials without exposing sensitive content


üõ†Ô∏è How it works:

Simply select any frame containing text layers and run the plugin. It will automatically convert all text elements into ghost frames whilst preserving their visual hierarchy and styling. The result is a clean, professional representation of your design that maintains visual structure without exposing actual content.


üé® Pro tip: Use it on component instances to quickly create skeleton loading states that match your actual UI!


Thanks to Bony Fasius Gultom (@itsmebfg) on the community for the free Coffee App mockup used in the plugin visual.

accepted.name: Karl Koch
accepted.description: Currently building DuckDuckGo, Cosmic, Hand‚Ä∫‚Ä∫over, and plugins.run.

plugins.tagline: Convert text layers into ghost frames - create redacted or placeholder versions of your designs

plugins.name: Documentation Link Bulk Edit
plugins.description:
Maintaining your design system has now become easier with the assistance of this super handy plugin. No longer do you need to edit the documentation link for each component individually.


Instructions

  • Select all the components or components sets you wish to edit the documentation link.
  • Paste the documentation link and click ‚ÄùUpdate Link‚Äù.
  • If you wish to clear/remove the documentation links, simply leave the input field empty and click ‚ÄùUpdate Link‚Äù.
  • Ensure you only select main components or component sets; component instances won't work.


How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
plugins.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

72428.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

plugins.name: Figma to Storyblok
plugins.description:
Figma to Storyblok bridges the gap between design and content management. With just one click, you can export Figma components directly into your Storyblok space, instantly turning them into ready-to-use content blocks.


How to use the Figma to Storyblok Sync plugin:


1. Install the plugin‚Ä®

Once installed, click Get Started in Figma, go through our onboarding slider, and click Connect Account in the final step.


2. Connect your account‚Ä®

Use your Personal Access Token, generated in your Storyblok account, to enable a secure and seamless integration.


3. Export from Figma to Storyblok‚Ä®

Select and export one frame at a time. In Storyblok, each frame becomes a universal block you can use as a component, with an auto-updated image preview.


Have feedback or need help?

Contact us at figma@storyblok.com

accepted.name: Storyblok
accepted.description:
Empowering teams with joyful headless CMS to create, scale, and deliver bigger, faster market impact. üöÄ Let‚Äôs connect! 

#Storyblok #HeadlessCMS

plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma components and frames into content blocks within your Storyblok project.

2. Connect your account‚Ä®

Use your Personal Access Token, generated in your Storyblok account, to enable a secure and seamless integration.

plugins.name: Export to WebP
plugins.description:
Export to WebP transforms your Figma frames into optimised WebP images with just a few clicks.


WebP offers significantly smaller file sizes compared to PNG while maintaining excellent visual quality - perfect for web projects where performance matters.


Key Features


Smart Target File Size Optimisation ‚ú® NEW

‚Ä¢Set your desired file size (e.g., "100 KB" or "2 MB") and let the plugin automatically find the perfect quality setting

‚Ä¢Advanced binary search algorithm optimises quality to hit your exact target size

‚Ä¢Real-time progress feedback shows optimisation iterations

‚Ä¢Perfect for meeting specific file size requirements or bandwidth constraints

‚†Ä

Advanced Transparency Control ‚ú® NEW

‚Ä¢Preserve or remove alpha channel (transparency) based on your needs

‚Ä¢Keep transparent backgrounds for overlays and UI elements

‚Ä¢Remove transparency for smaller file sizes when opacity isn't needed

‚Ä¢Smart default settings optimize for most common use cases


Efficient WebP Conversion

‚Ä¢Convert any Figma element to WebP format with high-quality results

‚Ä¢Save up to 30-75% in file size compared to PNG format

‚Ä¢Maintain visual quality while dramatically reducing file sizes


Flexible Quality Settings

‚Ä¢Choose from preset quality options (High Quality, Web Optimised, Ultra Compressed)

‚Ä¢Fine-tune compression with a precise quality slider (0-100%)

‚Ä¢Create and save custom quality presets for your specific needs


Batch Processing

‚Ä¢Convert multiple elements simultaneously

‚Ä¢Real-time progress tracking with accurate completion estimates

‚Ä¢Optimised memory usage for handling large selections


Export Options

‚Ä¢Save as a single ZIP file containing all WebP images

‚Ä¢Download individual WebP files directly

‚Ä¢Automatic naming based on your Figma layer structure


Detailed Statistics

‚Ä¢View before/after file size comparisons

‚Ä¢See exact file size savings for each conversion

‚Ä¢Track total compression savings across your selection


Simple Workflow

‚Ä¢Select elements ‚Üí Choose quality ‚Üí Convert ‚Üí Download

‚Ä¢Integrates seamlessly with your Figma workflow

‚Ä¢Works with frames, components, groups, shapes, text, and more


Performance Optimised

‚Ä¢Fast conversions even for high-resolution graphics

‚Ä¢Memory-efficient processing for large batches


Please leave some feedback if you find this plugin useful :)
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to WebP - smaller files, same quality

plugins.name: DSekon Auto Arrange
plugins.description:
The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.


  1.  Launch the plugin. The UI panel opens.
  2. Select a bunch of items.
  3. Use button ‚Äú+‚Äù to create an adaptive auto layout.
  4. Change the frame width.
  5. The elements will be rearranged automatically (The elements will also be rebuilt when the elements inside the frame are changed, except for deletion).


IMPORTANT: To automatically rearranged the elements, the UI panel must be open.


The plugin has the ability to sort the elements inside the frame in alphabetical order.


DSekon.com

Donate
plugins.tagline: The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.

plugins.name: Frame Duplicator
plugins.description:
Duplicate the selected frame into any number of new sizes, perfect for creating large quantities of display ads and similar tasks.


Here's how:

Prepare your design using Figma's built-in Auto Layout properties or Constraints settings for scaling.


For example:

JBL-Summer-200x300

JBL-Summer-1200x400


Provide a list of sizes, separated by line breaks. You can include additional text in each line, which will be used to name the frames.


The plugin creates duplicates of the master frame in your specified sizes and adjusts the elements according to the settings, scaling, resizing, and repositioning as necessary.

accepted.name: DigiComm
accepted.description:
Web Design Agency
Design ‚ú∂ Animation ‚ú¶ Development

plugins.tagline: Duplicate and resize from list input

plugins.name: Lilly Icon - Free Rive Animated & Static Icons
plugins.description:
What is Lilly Icon?

Lilly Icon is a free and growing collection of static and Rive animated icons. With this Figma plugin, you can easily insert static icons into your designs. For development phase, animated Rive (.riv) versions are available on the Lilly Icon website to bring your projects to life.


Is it really free?

Yes‚Äîcompletely free! No paywalls or sign-ups. All icons are licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0, including the animated ones.


Thanks to your donations, Lilly keeps expanding with more icons and new features.


Created and maintained with love by Sajjad Dashti ‚Äî graphic, product, and motion designer.

Questions? Reach out at hi@sajjaddashti.ir.
plugins.tagline: Add static Lilly icons to Figma designs with quick search and easy insert.

plugins.name: Text node name to id
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

7903.name: Text node name to id
7903.description:

The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

plugins.name: Figma to Frappe Builder
plugins.description:
You can simply select the frames you want to copy and click on the "Copy Frame" button. The plugin will copy the converted frames to the clipboard. You can then paste the copied frames in the Frappe Builder.


Notes


- The plugin is currently in development and may have some issues.

- Only frames using auto-layout are expected to work correctly at this time.

- It is recommended to copy small sections of a page rather than the entire page.
plugins.tagline: Plugin to copy frames from Figma to Frappe Builder

plugins.name: DLTA
plugins.description:
The Delta Wireframe Converter plugin for Figma revolutionizes the design workflow by enabling the conversion of static wireframes, HTML, and CSS into dynamic Figma layers. Created by DLTA, this innovative tool enhances collaboration between designers and developers, ensuring consistency and precision in your design projects.

Key Features and Functionality:

Wireframe to Figma Conversion:

Automatically transform your static wireframes into interactive Figma layers.

Retain the original layout and structure for a seamless design transition.

HTML Integration:

Import HTML files directly into Figma, converting code into fully functional design layers.

Preserve the integrity of web designs, making manual adjustments unnecessary.

Secure Authorization:

Safely authorize access to DLTA‚Äôs services, ensuring your data remains protected.

Manage permissions effectively to maintain the security of your projects.
plugins.tagline: Convert wireframes, HTML, and CSS into interactive Figma layers seamlessly.

Automatically creates a structured site map with:

  1. Tree layout with directional connectors
  2. Up to 2000 URLs
  3. Depth control (1‚Äì10 levels)
  4. Support for Squares, Stickies, or Text objects
  5. Optional link display (link: https://...)
  6. Auto-resizing nodes
  7. Ignore branches containing specific URLs
  8. Choose to start layout from top or center of the canvas

Ideal for:

  1. Content planning
  2. IA/UX audits
  3. SEO visualizations


üí° Works entirely offline ‚Äì just load your sitemap.xml and go!

Built for FigJam.

‚úÖ Auto-fixing issues ‚Äì Snaps everything to the nearest valid grid value.

Simply select a frame or elements, run the check, and ensure everything follows proper spacing rules!


Feedback welcome.

plugins.name: BlockFlow
plugins.description:
BlockFlow is a Figma plugin that allows you to easily convert your designs into WordPress blocks. This plugin is designed to simplify the process of transforming your visual projects into functional WordPress code. The exported blocks do not contain inline styles and rely solely on the logical attributes of the supported blocks.


Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground


Usage

  1. Select the design elements you want to convert into WordPress blocks
  2. Open the BlockFlow plugin from the Figma toolbar
  3. Click the "Convert to blocks" button in the plugin interface
  4. The plugin will automatically convert the selected elements into WordPress blocks
  5. Once the conversion is complete, the HTML code of the blocks will be copied to your clipboard
  6. Paste the copied code into your WordPress editor or HTML file


Supported blocks


  1. Group
  2. Separator
  3. Image
  4. Buttons
  5. Paragraph
  6. Headings
  7. Cover
  8. Columns
  9. List
  10. Media & Text
  11. Blockquote
  12. Pullquote
  13. Details
  14. Icon block - third party plugin
  15. Advanced Columns ‚Äì third party plugin


Tips for optimal use


  1. Follow instructions on the Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground
  2. Organize your Figma design logically, grouping related elements using the auto-layout feature when necessary.
  3. If you need to create a list, you can use a group by naming the block list and the child elements list-item.
  4. A list can also be created by applying the text list style and naming the element list.
  5. The aspect ratio from rectangles with an image layer will be automatically extracted and adjusted to the closest WordPress predefined default ratio.
  6. The list item block in WordPress only supports text, so any other element in your list group will not be exported.
  7. Configure the layout size in the advanced settings panel according to your theme settings.


Note

In this early experimental phase, the plugin does not provide controls to define or import the information found in the theme.json file.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma design to WordPress Blocks

104018.name: BlockFlow
104018.description:
BlockFlow is a Figma plugin that allows you to easily convert your designs into WordPress blocks. This plugin is designed to simplify the process of transforming your visual projects into functional WordPress code. The exported blocks do not contain inline styles and rely solely on the logical attributes of the supported blocks.


Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground


Usage

  1. Select the design elements you want to convert into WordPress blocks
  2. Open the BlockFlow plugin from the Figma toolbar
  3. Click the "Convert to blocks" button in the plugin interface
  4. The plugin will automatically convert the selected elements into WordPress blocks
  5. Once the conversion is complete, the HTML code of the blocks will be copied to your clipboard
  6. Paste the copied code into your WordPress editor or HTML file


Supported blocks


  1. Group
  2. Separator
  3. Image
  4. Buttons
  5. Paragraph
  6. Headings
  7. Cover
  8. Columns
  9. List
  10. Media & Text
  11. Blockquote
  12. Pullquote
  13. Details
  14. Icon block - third party plugin
  15. Advanced Columns ‚Äì third party plugin


Tips for optimal use


  1. Follow instructions on the Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground
  2. Organize your Figma design logically, grouping related elements using the auto-layout feature when necessary.
  3. If you need to create a list, you can use a group by naming the block list and the child elements list-item.
  4. A list can also be created by applying the text list style and naming the element list.
  5. The aspect ratio from rectangles with an image layer will be automatically extracted and adjusted to the closest WordPress predefined default ratio.
  6. The list item block in WordPress only supports text, so any other element in your list group will not be exported.
  7. Configure the layout size in the advanced settings panel according to your theme settings.


Note

In this early experimental phase, the plugin does not provide controls to define or import the information found in the theme.json file.

manifest.name: BlockFlow ‚Äì Convert design to WordPress Blocks

104018.release_notes:
* Added a new guide button
* Experimental typography options to override the predefined scale used for automatic block recognition
* New option to reset the settings
* Fixed issues with the settings loading
* Minor fix and improvements
104018.tagline: Convert your Figma design to WordPress Blocks

plugins.name: JSON to Canvas Ninja - fastest way from data to figma Design
plugins.description:
Effortlessly enhance your Figma designs with real data using JSON to Canvas Ninja. Populate your designs with actual product content, making your prototypes accurate, realistic, and production-ready. Say goodbye to placeholder text and lorem ipsum‚Äîdesign with confidence and bring your ideas closer to reality.


  1. generate infinite designs based on one single component, frame or group
  2. populate texts and images
  3. apply to any of your figma layers
  4. super straight forward UI
  5. easily distinguish image data from text data via an icon
  6. upload or paste your JSON (more options coming soon)


Link to a little how-to documentation


Any feedback is welcome. I will check and update the plugin based on it.
plugins.tagline: Import real JSON data into Figma, create realistic prototypes, bring designs closer to production.

plugins.name: Image EffectSync
plugins.description:
This plugin allows users to copy adjustment settings (such as exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.) from one image and paste them onto multiple selected images. With a simple operation, users can batch adjust the image effects of several pictures. The plugin supports the following features:


Copy Settings: Copy all image adjustment settings from a selected image, including exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, highlights, and shadows.


Paste Settings: Apply the copied adjustment settings to multiple selected images, ensuring consistent effects across all images, saving time and increasing efficiency.


This plugin is ideal for designers who need to apply consistent image effects across multiple images, especially when working on style uniformity or adjustments.
plugins.tagline: Copy adjusments from image

121283.name: Image EffectSync
121283.description:
This plugin allows users to copy adjustment settings (such as exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.) from one image and paste them onto multiple selected images. With a simple operation, users can batch adjust the image effects of several pictures. The plugin supports the following features:


Copy Settings: Copy all image adjustment settings from a selected image, including exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, highlights, and shadows.


Paste Settings: Apply the copied adjustment settings to multiple selected images, ensuring consistent effects across all images, saving time and increasing efficiency.


This plugin is ideal for designers who need to apply consistent image effects across multiple images, especially when working on style uniformity or adjustments.
121283.release_notes:
This update addresses user feedback on image pasting. A new checkbox has been added to give users more control over the scalemode value:

Default: The scalemode remains unchanged when pasting.
Uncheck: The scalemode will be adjusted to match the new image.
This simple option allows users to customize their experience and streamline their workflow.

plugins.name: Accessibility Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Accessibility Contrast Checker helps you quickly check the contrast of text layers in your Figma designs for WCAG compliance. The results clearly show which layers pass or fail the contrast standards, making it easy to improve accessibility.


How to Use:

  1. Select a frame with text layers, or simply select one or more text layers.
  2. Click the "Check" button.
  3. Review the results to see which layers pass or fail WCAG contrast compliance.


That's it! üéâ


Note: Currently, the plugin works best with solid backgrounds. It might not handle hidden layers, low opacity settings, or gradients perfectly.
plugins.tagline: Easily check text contrast for WCAG compliance on solid backgrounds in your Figma designs.

109171.name: Accessibility Contrast Checker
109171.description:
Accessibility Contrast Checker helps you quickly check the contrast of text layers in your Figma designs for WCAG compliance. The results clearly show which layers pass or fail the contrast standards, making it easy to improve accessibility.


How to Use:

  1. Select a frame with text layers, or simply select one or more text layers.
  2. Click the "Check" button.
  3. Review the results to see which layers pass or fail WCAG contrast compliance.


That's it! üéâ


Note: Currently, the plugin works best with solid backgrounds. It might not handle hidden layers, low opacity settings, or gradients perfectly.
109171.tagline: Easily check text contrast for WCAG compliance on solid backgrounds in your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Table of Contents - An Index Page Generator
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to redundant index page creation and hello to effortless organization with Table of Contents Figma Plugin - An Index Page Generator


  1. This plugin will help you quickly generate a basic Table of Contents (ToC) for your design files, making it easier for you to style and team and stakeholders to navigate project density.
  2. Page Creation happens with a click on "Generate." A new page with a Table of Contents will be added to your Figma file, organizing your design for easy reference.
  3. Hierarchical Indexing supports both top-level items and nested sub-items, preserving the structure of the sections and frames you select.
  4. Using the plugin get the redundant work out of the way.


This plugin is perfect for anyone working on complex projects with multiple frames and sections. Whether you‚Äôre working solo or in a collaborative environment, it helps bring clarity to your design files, making them more accessible and (hopefully ü§û) understandable for everyone involved.


This plugin is part of a series focused on elevating the little things we designers need! It‚Äôs also a way of giving back to the design community. xOxO

accepted.name: Mina Awadallah
accepted.description: A designer with a simple purpose!

plugins.tagline: Easily generate Table of contents / Index however you name it!

plugins.name: cmd-fill
plugins.description:
cmd your workflow

cmd-fill gives you a collection of menu-driven, fill-related controls to supercharge your workflow.


The aim of this plugin is to save you time by surfacing those super-common, mouse-driven tasks - and provide access to them via the plugin menu.


Using your favorite keyboard shortcut or macro tool, assign any of these actions as shortcuts for the ultimate productivity boost.


cmd-fill features

Along with basic features around adding and removing fills, strokes, effects, and export settings, cmd-fill empowers you with features like:

  • Gradient mirroring and directionality (including 45¬∞ angles)
  • Image scale mode control (Fill, Fit, Crop, Tile)
  • Copy color values across color modes (CSS, RGB, HSL, HSB)
  • Directly apply strokes to specific edges
  • Invert colors (including linear gradients)
  • Flatten layer fills to create a single new hex value
  • Dynamic black & white color (changes based on background)
  • Invisible-yet-selectable hitbox fill


Check out more on each feature below, along with conditions to help you know how they can be used. cmd-fill has fairly robust error notifications, which should help direct you to issues and how to work through them.


---

features & conditions


Add Fill

Add a white, black, gradient, image, dynamic black, or hitbox fill to selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Gradient will pick up any current fill colors, if any
  • Dynamic fill changes between black and white depending on it‚Äôs background color
  • Hitbox is invisible, but allows you to select the layer using cmd + click


Remove Fill

Remove all fills from selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers


Invert Fill Color

Inverts the fill color, where light becomes dark and vice versa and colors change to their compliment.

  • Use on one or more layers with a single fill
  • Supports linear gradients with transparent or opaque stops


Flatten Fill Color

Replaces two fills with a single fill using the flattened hex value of the previous two fills.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Layer must use two fills
  • Top fill must use transparency, bottom fill must be fully opaque
  • Works on linear gradients if all stops are fully opaque


Copy Fill Value

Copy the specified color mode value of a layer to the clipboard.

  • Use on a single layer with a single fill


Copy Flattened Hex

Copies the flattened hex value of the previous two fills to the clipboard, retaining the current fills of the layer.

  • Use on a single layer
  • Layer must use two fills
  • Top fill must use transparency, bottom fill must be fully opaque
  • Does not support gradients


Mirror Gradient

Reversed the gradient color stops.

  • Use on one or more layers with linear gradients
  • Layer must have only one gradient fill


Gradient Orientation

Orient gradients in any direction you choose.

  • Use on one or more layers with linear gradients
  • Layer must have only one fill


Image Mode

Change the image scale mode for selected images.

  • Use on one or more layers with an image fill


Add Stroke

Add black or dynamic stroke to all or specified edges of selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Replaces existing stroke color and weight


Modify Stroke

Applies the stroke to the specified edges or alignment positions.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Maintains existing stroke color and weight


Remove Stokes

Remove all strokes from selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers


Layer Effects

Apply effects to selected layers, adding to any existing effects.

  • Use on one or more layers


Layer Export

Apply export settings to selected layers, replacing any existing settings.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • iOS & Android will add multiple export scales according to platform


Notes

cmd + fill will ignore and in many cases remove fills which have been set to hidden

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer ‚Ä¢ Plugin Author ‚Ä¢ Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: cmd-fill gives you a collection of menu-driven, fill-related controls to supercharge your workflow!

plugins.name: Data Table Builder Pro
plugins.description:
Data Table Builder Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you quickly create, customize, and save reusable table designs.


Build Data Tables Fast

Add multiple columns with different data types (text, number, boolean, ratings, labels, avatars, and more) so you can shape your table exactly how you need it.


Visual Table Builder

Edit columns in a live preview with inline editing. Easily tweak styling, spacing, borders, and more.


Theming & Auto-layout Controls

Choose from Shadcn themes and customize any element color to suit your brand or design and as row or column based auto layout.


CSV Import

Quickly populate large tables by importing CSV data. Perfect for teams handling data from spreadsheets.


Save & Reuse Templates

Save your tables‚Äîcomplete with styling and layout‚Äîto reuse next time. You can store unlimited custom templates and iterate on them over time.


Clearly Named Layers

Export your table into Figma file as ready-to-use auto-layout frames with easy to understand layer names.


Why Use Data Table Builder Pro?

Collaborative

115651.name: Data Table Builder Pro
115651.description:
Data Table Builder Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you quickly create, customize, and save reusable table designs.


Build Data Tables Fast

Add multiple columns with different data types (text, number, boolean, ratings, labels, avatars, and more) so you can shape your table exactly how you need it.


Visual Table Builder

Edit columns in a live preview with inline editing. Easily tweak styling, spacing, borders, and more.


Theming & Auto-layout Controls

Choose from Shadcn themes and customize any element color to suit your brand or design and as row or column based auto layout.


CSV Import

Quickly populate large tables by importing CSV data. Perfect for teams handling data from spreadsheets.


Save & Reuse Templates

Save your tables‚Äîcomplete with styling and layout‚Äîto reuse next time. You can store unlimited custom templates and iterate on them over time.


Clearly Named Layers

Export your table into Figma file as ready-to-use auto-layout frames with easy to understand layer names.


Why Use Data Table Builder Pro?


Time-Saving

Create data-dense mockups fast without manually creating rows and columns.


Consistent Designs

Ensure your tables maintain a polished look across multiple projects thanks to reusable templates.


Flexible & Customizable

Tailor column types, theme colors, and layout directions to fit your exact needs.


Collaborative

Import real data from CSV for realistic scenarios or stakeholder presentations.


Give your data the presentation it deserves and level up your Figma projects with Table Templates Pro!


Free trial limitations:

  1. 3 table exports
  2. No saved tables

plugins.name: Absolutely
plugins.description:
This plugin was created to assign keyboard shortcuts to access the absolute positioning property - nothing more. This function is native to Figma and Figma Slides.


To use the plugin, select layer(s) and run your command (Toggle, Apply, Remove).


Note: Absolute position can only be applied to children of auto layout frames.


Setup a shortcut: I use BetterTouchTool to manage my keyboard shortcuts.


Here is an example, since it's very unintuitive:

Keyboard Shortcut > Trigger Menu Bar Menu-Item > Plugins;Saved plugins;Absolutely;Apply


Enjoy!

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer ‚Ä¢ Plugin Author ‚Ä¢ Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Control absolute positioning with a plugin!

plugins.name: Click Depth
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin for creating captivating layered patterns with depth.

Key features:


Seamless Figma integration: Works directly within your Figma designs

Shape library: Access circles, squares, triangles, and custom polygons

Layer stacking: Build complex patterns with up to 10+ customizable layers

Depth control: Adjust layer count and spacing for varied depth effects

Color picker integration: Use Figma's color tools for precise gradients

Transform options: Resize, rotate, and position shapes within Figma's interface

Blending mode support: Utilize Figma's blending capabilities between layers

Vector output: Generate scalable vector patterns for any project size


Enhance your Figma designs with:


Hypnotic backgrounds for UI/UX projects

Unique illustrations and abstract art

Eye-catching logo elements and brand visuals

Custom UI components with depth


Ideal for UI/UX designers, graphic artists, and Figma enthusiasts looking to add dimension and visual interest to their projects quickly and easily."
plugins.tagline: Layer by layer

plugins.name: DesignFast: Text from Anything (Text from Image, Text from PDF)
plugins.description:
Extract text from any source and transform it into editable Figma designs in one click. Our AI-powered plugin preserves text structure while making it instantly editable in your Figma workspace.


Features:

  1. Text from Image: Extract text from any image with precision.
  2. Text from PDF: Seamlessly convert PDF text to Figma.
  3. Editable Figma Design: Transform extracted content into fully Editable Figma Design.
  4. Privacy-First: Your data stays secure, Not data is stored.


Our mission is to enhance productivity and creativity, making high-level design techniques accessible to all and streamlining the creation of enriching visual content.


More Information

For further details, please visit our official website. https://designfast.io
plugins.tagline: Extract Text to¬†Figma in One Click: ‚Ä®Transform Text into Editable Figma Design

plugins.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
plugins.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text
plugins.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

126847.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
126847.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to all domains to fetch placeholder images and lorem ipsum text from various sources.

126847.release_notes:
Key Features (Excerpt for Release Notes)
Dynamic Word Count Matching: "Smart Lorem Ipsum" counts the number of words in each text layer within a frame (excluding punctuation) and generates Lorem Ipsum text with the exact same word count. For example, if a text layer contains "Hi, Jonathan" (2 words), it will be replaced with "Lorem ipsum" (2 words).
Seamless Integration: All text layers within a frame are automatically detected and updated with a single click.
126847.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

plugins.name: JSON to Text Fill
plugins.description:
Imagine you need to create a table with 10 rows and 10 columns. What if, instead of manually replacing text for 100 layers, you could use ChatGPT to generate random, "real life" looking data and use our plugin to fill all selected text layers with the newly generated text?


Imagine no more. Simply generate your JSOn using ChatGPT (see prompt examples here), select the text layers you want to replace in Figma, and fire up our plugin.


Current limitations:


  1. Layers will be filled according to Figma layering. If you don't get the right order, try re-ordering the Figma layers and repeat the process.
  2. Comma-separated values and complex JSON structured currently not accepted
plugins.tagline: Replace text layers with any text content in JSON format
